main event: A civilian observed an object described as satellite-like traveling from east to west on July 25, 1965, in Gales Ferry, Connecticut.
interesting points: The object was seen as part of a train of three sightings over a period of several days.,The object performed a wobbling motion before disappearing towards the horizon.,14 witnesses reported over a 60-day period without any objects returning.,This case was ultimately closed due to insufficient data for further evaluation.,The object appeared larger and longer than wide compared to previous sightings.
witness description: a civilian who observed the object and reported it to the Air Force
